prompt_init: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
prompt_update: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
initial_story:
The Prince and Princess of Wales have released a new photo of their children Prince George, Princess Charlotte and Prince Louis, to celebrate Christmas.

In the black and white photo, which was taken by Josh Shinner, the children are seen sitting on a wooden bench.

Shinner also took the image used on the family's Christmas card this year.

The couple posted the picture on social media, writing "Wishing everyone a very Merry Christmas, from our family to yours! W & C".

In their Christmas card image, released earlier this month, the family was seen together in another black and white photo arranged around Princess Charlotte sitting on a chair.

They were all wearing white shirts, with Catherine, Princess of Wales, and daughter Charlotte, eight, wearing jeans, while the Prince of Wales wore black trousers along with son Prince George, 10, and Prince Louis, five, who was in shorts.

In the picture the couple shared on Christmas Day, the three children seem to be wearing the same clothes and shoes as in the Christmas card image.

The family is at Sandringham in Norfolk for Christmas Day and is attending a church service in the morning.

Catherine hosted the Together At Christmas carol service event at Westminster Abbey, which was broadcast on Christmas Eve.
stories: The Prince and Princess of Wales have shared a recent black and white photograph of their children, Prince George, Princess Charlotte, and Prince Louis, as a Christmas celebration. Taken by Josh Shinner, the image features the children sitting on a wooden bench. Shinner also captured this year’s family Christmas card photo. The couple posted the new picture on social media, accompanied by the message “Sending warm wishes for a Merry Christmas to all, from our family to yours! W & C.” The family wore white shirts in both photos, with Princess Catherine and Charlotte in jeans, while Prince William wore black trousers, along with George and Louis, who had on shorts. The children appear to be wearing the same outfits and shoes in the newly released photo as in the Christmas card image. The family is currently spending Christmas Day at Sandringham in Norfolk and will attend a church service in the morning. Princess Catherine recently hosted the Together At Christmas carol service event at Westminster Abbey, which was broadcast on Christmas Eve.

The couple shared the new picture on social media with the message "Wishing a Merry Christmas to all, from our family to yours! W & C." The family is dressed in white shirts, with Princess Catherine and Charlotte wearing jeans, while Prince William has on black trousers, and George and Louis are in shorts. The children seem to be wearing the same outfits and shoes in the new photo as in the Christmas card image. Currently, the family is celebrating Christmas Day in Sandringham, Norfolk, where they will attend a church service in the morning. This follows Princess Catherine's organization of the Together At Christmas carol service at Westminster Abbey, which was aired on Christmas Eve.
